description.en: The learner passes the essential phases of starting a business: assessing their entrepreneurial qualities, devising a business idea and developing it according to the business process.
description.et: Õppija läbib ettevõtlusega alustamiseks olulised etapid, milleks on oma ettevõtlikkuse hindamine, äriidee leidmine ja selle edasiarendamine vastavalt ärimudeli väljatöötamise protsessile.

objectives.en: The course enables the learner to participate in the business process for making calculated decisions about planning their further career (e.g. working as an entrepreneur or entrepreneurial employee). The learner can develop creative thinking, learn the principles of entrepreneurial behaviour and obtain knowledge about identifying business opportunities as well as about developing, evaluating, and implementing business ideas in different business environments.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on võimaldada õppijal läbida ärimudeli väljatöötamise protsess, mille käigus omandatakse teadmised ärimudeli disainist, mis hõlmab endas nii ärimudeli väljatöötamise planeerimist, arendamist, hindamist kui ka selle elluviimist.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) analyses themselves and their role in a team and business processes;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) analüüsib ja reflekteerib ennast ning oma rolli meeskonnas;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) applyes the methods for devising, developing and evaluating business ideas;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) rakendab äriidee loomise, arendamise ja hindamise meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) analyses business processes and the business environment as well as their impact on a planned enterprise;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) kirjeldab kavandatava ettevõtte ärimudeli väljatöötamise protsessi ja analüüsib selle sobivust kavandatavale ettevõttele;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) presents their ideas reasonably and convincingly, including their planned business model;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) esitab argumenteeritult ja veenvalt oma ideid, sealhulgas kavandatava ettevõtte ärimudelit;
